Name: Jar Sam
About the game: Jar Sam goes on a journey! You’ll find plenty of exiting game challenges at more than 40 different levels! Show you savvy at the levels full of various obstructions to help courageous Jar Sam to reach his goal. Collect different colours, make colourful blocks that will help you to get over deep pits and sharp thorns – little Sam always has something to do! - unique puzzle game that requires nonstandard decisions - many styles and ways to pass entertaining levels - 4 colours with different features that the hero can get - more than 40 unique levels - find a special approach to each level!
